short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn words and improve your vocabulary by news, blogs, Youtube captions and Youtube Music lyrics using spaced repetition method

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your Vocabulary with our Google Chrome Extension and Telegram Bot!

Do you often come across new words while browsing the internet, watching videos or listening to music, but struggle to remember them later? With our extension, you can easily add any new words you encounter to your vocabulary list and learn them using the proven spaced repetition method.

Our extension seamlessly integrates with your web browsing experience, allowing you to quickly add new words to your vocabulary list with just a few clicks. Whether you're reading news articles, browsing blogs, or watching YouTube videos with subtitles, you can easily add new words to your vocabulary list and start learning them right away.

With our spaced repetition algorithm, you'll be able to learn new words efficiently and effectively. The algorithm is designed to show you the words you need to review at the right time, based on your learning progress. This means that you'll be able to learn new words faster and remember them longer.

Our Google Chrome extension is the perfect tool for anyone looking to improve their vocabulary and language skills. Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who loves learning, our extension will help you achieve your goals. So why wait? Download our extension today and start learning new words like a pro!
